name: PreKindergarten Program
description: Serves Ages: Children ages 2 years & 9 months to 5 years old. Children must turn 3 on or before December 1st of the year they wish to enroll. Mission Education Center (MEC), all students have opportunities to engage in a high quality arts program that includes visual arts, performing arts, music and dance. All students also have high quality physical education taught by specialists. They focus on accelerating academic skills and confidence so students can succeed in kindergarten and beyond. Curr

howToGetIt: Applications are accepted year-round and enrollment made on a rolling basis depending on openings. Follow application direction via Online TOOL.
cost: Free or reduced cost for income-eligible families.
address: 1670 Noe Street  CA 94131, San Francisco, CA, 94131
